response.answer_text: You can get the right keywords for your article first after choosing the article and your content your keywords targeting is crucial because the You topic title and content is key for choosing the keywords you want to target accordingly. Keyword targeting is the main prospect that builds you back links for your site. Keyword targeting gives you better traffic and makes your site visibility in SERP’s.

Keyword Research is most important part while building and maintaining the website for any topic or niche. If website is designed by ignoring the keyword research strategy, then it will be difficult to get the traffic on your website and so as the revenue. Even if your website has good content, quality images and professional look, without proper target keywords, revenue generation will not happen. If you are designing a website for selling the products then buyer keywords should be focused rather than non-buyer keywords. To understand more about keywords, you have to use few Keyword analysis tools. Mostly, those are paid tools but they do offer free trails for certain period. You can use them. Using such keyword tools, you can research on your competitors as well. Please refer my Quora profile for in depth details about this. I have explained all the details with step by step process. You can comment on it in case you have any further doubts. Happy Learning..! :)

Keyword research is most importent part of seo and blogging To do keyword research, you can use diff different market available keywords like ubersuggest, google keyword planner which are free and ahref, semrush which are paid. There are lots of stratergy blogger are using to find correct keywords. Here is the easy method to find most profitable keyword with less struggle Try to identify your niche, for eg: health is your industry then you can choose weightloss is your nicheIdentify topics in your niche. like weight loss food is a topicPut that topic in your keyword research tool and you'll see thousand of keywords. For eg: best weight loss foodDo more research and find most relevent and long tail keywords which should have decent amount of traffic.Never choose meaningless keywords, like dollar to inr. This kind of keyword may have huge traffic but no one visit any page.
